markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Sociable](/Feats.aspx?ID=961) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Half-Elf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=85" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 15 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

You’re extremely extroverted, and you often spend your time carousing or otherwise socializing. You are trained in [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) (or another skill of your choice if you were already trained in Diplomacy), and you gain the [Hobnobber](/Feats.aspx?ID=791) skill feat.
name: Sociable
